title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Seed Potatoes)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Seed Potatoes) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (seed potatoes) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Seed Potatoes) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 641 of
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Seed Potatoes) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 641 of 
2015) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Directive” (as amended by European Union (Seed Potatoes) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 199 of 2019)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2002/56/EC of 13 June 20022(as 
amended by Council Directive 2003/61/EC of 18 June 20033, 
Commission Implementing Directive 2013/63/EU of 17 December 
20134, Commission Implementing Decision 2014/367/EU of 16 June 
20145 and Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2016/317 of 3 
March 20166), and Commission Decision 2004/3/EC of 19 December 
20037 (as amended by 2014/105/EU: Commission Implementing 
Decision of 24 February 20148), Commission Decision 2004/842/EC of 
1 December 200049 (as amended by Commission Implementing 
(EU) 2016/320 of 3 March 201610); Commission 
Decision 
Implementing Directive 2014/20/EU of 6 February 201111, Commission 
Implementing Directive 2014/21/EU of 6 February 201412, Commission 
Implementing Decision (EU) 2017/547 of 21 March 201713 and 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of the 11 February 
2020;”.

“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [203] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
2002/56/EC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on seed 
potatoes for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [203] 5
